name: Operation: Meat Grinder
description:
You must destroy the enemy base at all costs, even if it costs you your life.

Operation: Meat Grinder

OMG is a game made with the RGMv5 engine, using resources from https://opengameart.org/ and using music from James "Jimmy" Paddock http://jamespaddockmusic.com/ , used with permission.

It features 3 mission with 4 different weapons and was made for the 7 Day FPS jam.

Monster sprites by https://opengameart.org/users/nmn

Main theme by https://opengameart.org/users/nene

Texture pack by https://opengameart.org/users/mutantleg

Hope you enjoy it!

Philip "Liberation" Brown - 2020
